title: Arts Design Practice-Integrated Education for Environmental Sensitivity Development

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Design Principles, Material Understanding, and General Awareness of Environmental Issues
context.additional_context: Emphasizing reflective practice through action research methodologies, utilizing smartphone-based simple data searches and documentation

learning_goals: Students can create three practical artworks applying sustainable design principles (e.g., upcycling, biodegradable materials).
Learners can reflectively document environmental impact assessments (carbon footprint, resource circularity, etc.) in project journals.
During team final presentations, learners can explain environmental solutions for target regions linked to design concepts.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
